        Parameters:
        weapons - the list of weapons to choose from
        prompt - the prompt
        showCost - whether to show the cost of each weapon
        Returns:
        the user's answer
        Throws:
        InputCancelledException - thrown if the user's input is cancelled

                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> choices)
        Verify that the combination of selected effects is valid.
        Parameters:
        answers - the users selections as string numbers
        choices - the list of choices
        Returns:
        true if the combination of selected effects is valid, false otherwise
